name: Escape the Tomb (savnair, stiztics, Sabahat-Sami)
description:
You are in a tomb hunting for the famed golden chalice, locked behind a big door. You must find the key to unlock the door. Clear the rooms in order to get items to help you in the next room.  Some obstacles you will need to clear are closing walls, monsters, and a collapsing floor.

  •  Point & click to move your character.
  • Click/Hold right mouse button to shoot after picking up a weapon.

Audio:
